chart.title: Share of the population living in urban areas
chart.note: Because the estimates of city and metropolitan areas are based on national definitions of what constitutes a city or metropolitan area, cross-country comparisons should be made with caution.

Urban population (% of total population).citationShort: UN Population Division (via World Bank) (2025) – processed by Our World in Data
Urban population (% of total population).citationLong: UN Population Division (via World Bank) (2025) – processed by Our World in Data. “Urban population (% of total population)” [dataset]. UN Population Division (via World Bank), “World Development Indicators” [original data].
